page.title: 18TRAFFIC PROBLEMS ON A1.
page.content: The part of the north/south A1 through {Bedfordshire}is standard non-motorway type dual carriage way. It carries a huge volume of traffic each day, both long distance and local. The stretch going north from the{Black Cat {Roundabout}bisects the village of{ {Wyboston}and is a notorious accident black-spot. People living on the west side of the A1 experience great problems when trying to cross the north bound carriage way to get to the south bound one. First thing in the morning and late in the afternoon waits of upto 20 minutes are quite common, and you take your life in your hands when do you cross. The local community is campaigning for a flyover such as the one that has been approved for a similar situation 20 miles north at Sawtry. At present they have been told it will have to wait.
